action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2524 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 24. Record Vote Number: 175.
Amendment SA 2524 proposed by Senator Reid to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 2521. (consideration: CR S4884) Of a perfecting nature.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2524 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 24. Record Vote Number: 175.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2524 proposed by Senator Reid to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 2521.
